channel.description: Recent content in Catering on Business Directory

item.title: JD's Catering Services Limited
item.description:
About Us

JD’s Catering Services Limited offers exceptional catering services for all occasions, ensuring a memorable dining experience tailored to your event. With a focus on quality ingredients and personalized menus, we cater to both small gatherings and large celebrations.

Our Services

  • Event Catering: Professional catering for all occasions
  • Custom Menus: Personalized menu planning
  • Special Events: Comprehensive catering solutions

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Jason Daniel
  • Phone: 724-7804
  • Email: jdscatering@hotmail.com

item.title: Donafes Food Services Ltd.
item.description:
About Us

Donafes Food Services Ltd. specializes in supplying delicious cakes and pastries, perfect for any occasion. We also offer catering services for small to medium events, ensuring a delightful culinary experience for your guests with our quality baked goods and professional service.

Our Services

  • Custom Cakes: Beautifully crafted cakes for special occasions
  • Fresh Pastries: Daily selection of quality pastries
  • Event Catering: Professional catering for small to medium events
  • Specialty Baking: Custom baked goods for special requests

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Shobha Chadeesingh
  • Phone: 764-3967
  • Email: donafes@gmail.com
  • Social Media: Visit us on Facebook

item.title: Neil's Fast Food and Catering Services
item.description:
About Us

Neil’s Fast Food and Catering Services specializes in authentic Chinese cuisines, offering a diverse menu that caters to both individual meals and large events. With a focus on quality ingredients and traditional recipes, we provide a unique dining experience that brings the flavors of China to your table.

Our Services

  • Chinese Cuisine: Authentic Chinese dishes prepared with traditional recipes
  • Event Catering: Professional catering services for large events
  • Fast Food Service: Quick and delicious Chinese meals
  • Custom Menu Planning: Personalized menu options for special occasions

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Nirmal Dookhoo
  • Phone: 702-0607 / 382-8325
  • Email: neil.dookhoo@gmail.com

item.title: Mechelle's Catering
item.description:
About Us

Mechelle’s Catering specializes in small-scale catering services, offering a delightful selection of freshly baked breads, cakes, and rich cheesecakes. With a focus on quality ingredients and personalized service, we create memorable culinary experiences for any occasion.

Our Services

  • Small-Scale Catering: Personalized catering services for intimate gatherings
  • Fresh Breads: Daily selection of freshly baked artisanal breads
  • Custom Cakes: Beautifully crafted cakes for special occasions
  • Cheesecakes: Rich and creamy signature cheesecakes

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Mechelle Joseph
  • Phone: 773-8771
  • Email: mechellejoseph283@hotmail.com

item.title: Venissa's Catering & Authentic Foods Services
item.description:
About Us

Venissa’s Catering offers a delightful array of authentic dishes, featuring local home-ground curry, pepper sauce, Anchar, kuchela, and East Indian sweets. With a focus on traditional flavors and quality ingredients, we bring the taste of home to your events.

Our Services

  • Authentic Dishes: Traditional local cuisine prepared with authentic recipes
  • Home Ground Curry: Fresh, locally ground curry for authentic flavor
  • Traditional Condiments: Homemade pepper sauce, Anchar, and kuchela
  • East Indian Sweets: Traditional East Indian desserts and sweets

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Vanessa Ramjattan
  • Phone: 353-5431
  • Email: venissa.cateringservices@gmail.com

item.title: Arl's Kitchen and Kake Boutique
item.description:
About Us

Arl’s Kitchen and Kake Boutique specializes in custom cakes and catering services, offering a unique blend of creativity and flavor for all occasions. With a focus on quality ingredients and personalized designs, we ensure that every event is memorable and delicious.

Our Services

  • Custom Cakes: Beautifully designed custom cakes for weddings, birthdays, and special occasions
  • Catering Services: Professional catering for events of all sizes with personalized menu options

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Arlene Cilla Roberts
  • Phone: 304-1681
  • Email: arlskitchen199@gmail.com
